extension.summary: LazyLinks is a pile of account based urls that you can pop-up a browser window. Made from a old Pairing Tool.
extension.description: Web Browser needed like FireFox, Dolphin, Chrome. [CR] Simple to use, click the one you need [CR] and if all else fails just open the website needed on another device connected to your internet [CR] and it will do the same as this app.
